title: Responsibility-Based Science Learning Experience Design: Job Competency Enhancement Through Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Simulation/VR learning environments for students targeting science careers (research assistant/quality control, etc.) to strengthen self-directedness and accountability

learning_goals: Learners can responsibly design decision-making processes to solve scientific problems in VR simulation environments.
Learners can perform root cause analysis and corrective procedures for experimental errors with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can reflectively document and improve their learning outcomes at least three times based on peer assessments and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
